usefulItems: square baking pan (8 in. x 8 in.), parchment paper, refrigerator
title: Chocolate Pistachio Bars

ingredients.content: 3 ½ oz dark chocolate chips, vegan

preparations.content: Line a square baking pan (8 in. x 8 in.)  with parchment and set aside.
Place oats, almonds, maple syrup, coconut oil and vanilla into mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Spread dough into bottom of prepared pan, press firmly into base and refrigerate.
Place pistachios and maple syrup into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Press filling firmly onto chilled crust and refrigerate 10 minutes. Clean mixing bowl.
